notes.stm_decay: STM entries decay daily by valence * rate; reinforced entries reset decay.
notes.ltm_decay: LTM threads decay slower; must drop below min_valence to archive.
notes.summarization: Every 14 days, oldest STM > threshold are summarized into LTM.
notes.context_limit: Keep token usage under 100k; prune lowest-priority STM first.
notes.emotional_bias: Painful or fearful memories are weighed slightly heavier to reflect human salience.
